txt.en: 'When you return to Iáphel, could I bother you to deliver a token of our gratitude to Miruhir? We harvested some garlic scapes the other day. Their aroma and flavour speak to the season, and he is an accomplished cook. I'm sure he would appreciate the fresh ingredients.'
Derva has garlic scapes for Miruhir.

'For me? Oh these are beautiful.'

He takes a bite of one raw and smiles.

'Chopped fine and cooked in butter, this will go lovely over some roasted fish. Thank you for bringing me these.'
Garlic Scapes are a Fair Exchange for Wine
Derva has asked you to deliver garlic scapes to her friend Miruhir.\n\nYou can find Miruhir in Iáphel.
